definition: A nostalgic recollection of one's early experiences and memories during the period of childhood, often evoking sentimental emotions. This term is commonly used to refer to personal reminiscences or collective memories associated with one's upbringing and formative years.

examples.english: My childhood memories are full of happiness.

examples.german: Die Kindheitserinnerung an meinen ersten Schultag ist noch lebhaft.
examples.english: The childhood memory of my first day of school is still vivid.

examples.german: Kindheitserinnerungen können uns ein Leben lang begleiten.
examples.english: Childhood memories can accompany us throughout our lives.

examples.german: Die Kindheitserinnerung an den Weihnachtsabend ist besonders schön.
examples.english: The childhood memory of Christmas Eve is particularly beautiful.

examples.german: Kindheitserinnerungen können uns in schwierigen Zeiten Trost spenden.
examples.english: Childhood memories can provide comfort in difficult times.
